alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville, east central Anderson and northeastern Abbeville Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 247 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Anderson, or over Honea Path, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Belton, Williamston, Honea Path, West Pelzer, Donalds, Donaldson Center, Shoals Junction and Piedmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
